q1: Is Luca Modric Croatia's best player?
a1: Yes, he is the captain and their best player.
q2: Who did Croatia played in the final of the World Cup 2018? France
q3: It was a good name, don't know if Luca Modric is the best player, but the entire team is good
q5: Was 2018 Croatia's only World Cup appearance?
a5: No, they've made 4 out of the last 5 World Cups.
